channel.title: Github pages on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Github pages on A Hugo website

item.title: Steps to create github pages website from blogdown
item.description: Steps to Create Your public/ directory should be the GIT repository. You have two possible choices for setting up this repository locally. The first choice is to follow the default structure of a Hugo website like the diagram below, and initialize the GIT repository under the public/ directory: source/ │ ├── config.toml ├── content/ ├── themes/ ├── ... └── public/ | ├── .git/ ├── .nojekyll ├── index.html ├── about/ └── .
